UpdateChangeLog.ChangeLog:
- Fixed Adobe Audition Splash Screen Changer.
- Fixed Adobe Media Encoder Splash Screen Changer.
- Added Adobe InDesign Splash Screen Changer.
- Added Adobe Dreamweaver Splash Screen Changer.
- Added Adobe InCopy Splash Screen Changer.
- Added Adobe Character Animator Splash Screen Changer.

- Added multiple splash screen name possibilities for some Resource extractors.
- United Adobe Editor is now open-source meaning you can contribute to the development of United Adobe Editor.

- Added Photoshop Beta.
- Fixed the color disappearing on hover in color selector.

- Added Splash Screen Creator Link.
- Added UAE file loader (Used by Splash Screen Creator Online).

- Added Custom Config Creator.
- Added Share Config System.
- Added Explore Configs Page (You can view the configs shared by other users)
